pages.text: An $(item)Ominous Bottle$() is an item that gives a $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() the $(l:brewing/effects#bad_omen)$(thing)Bad Omen$() effect for 100 minutes when drunk. $(br2)$(item)Ominous Bottles$() have 5 levels, which correspond with the 5 levels of the effect.
$(br2)$(item)Ominous Bottles$() are dropped by $(thing)Raid Captains$() outside of raids, at a random level.
